name: The Horrible Heist
description:
The evil genius Dr. Dangertop has planned the perfect heist, and demands the assistance of his two underlings. By arming them with two remotely controlled robots, it is up to you and a partner in crime to break in and out of the illustrious 'Vault of Dimensions' and steal its prized content.

The Horrible Heist is a local co-op game where two players control one robot each that both have unique abilities. Play through levels where you first need to steal a keycard and then escape before the timer runs out.

Created by Filip & Anton!
